content: TV series or program **Are You My Brother?** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 错体双宝) is a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) TV series produced by [MediaCorp](/wiki/Mediacorp) in 1999. ## Main cast - [Tay Ping Hui](/wiki/Tay_Ping_Hui) - [Thomas Ong](/wiki/Thomas_Ong) - [Huang Biren](/wiki/Huang_Biren) - [Pan Lingling](/wiki/Pan_Lingling) - [Yvonne Lim](/wiki/Yvonne_Lim) - [Jacelyn Tay](/wiki/Jacelyn_Tay) ## Synopsis Chang Lee sells chicken at a [wet market](/wiki/Wet_market), and found out during a blood test for a bone marrow donation that he and a man named Dong Cheng are brothers. Dong Cheng, who only wanted to donate bone marrow as a way to seal the deal on a contract, had a hard time to accept his biological family works at a wet market for a living. - Official Website (in Simplified Chinese) - Program listing on Toggle.sg[*dead link*] This drama television program–related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Are You My Brother?
